keepinventory.config.keepPotionEffects.c: Keep player potion effects after death.
keepinventory.config.keepedSlots.comment: A list of slots ids for keep inventory.
keepinventory.config.keepedExperienceMod: Modifier that would be multiplied by your previous experience amount.
keepinventory.config.keepedHungerModifie: Modifier that would be multiplied by your previous hunger amount.
keepinventory.config.keepedHungerMinLimi: Minimal value of hunger after your death, to prevent spawn with empty hunger bar.
keepinventory.config.keepedSaturationMod: Modifier that would be multiplied by your previous saturation amount.
